Since October 2023, EFRAG has released the following batches of explanations (number of
explanations):
February 2024 12
March 2024 12
May 2024 44
July 2024 25
November 2024 64
December 2024 5
Total 162
Explanations released from February to November have been combined and been published in
the Compilation of Explanations – January–November 2024. The December 2024 batch contains
